examples: his resoluteness carried him through the battle
it was his unshakeable resolution to finish the work

definitions.text: a formal expression by a meeting; agreed to by a vote
bring to an end; settle conclusively
examples: The judge decided the case in favor of the plaintiff
The father adjudicated when the sons were quarreling over their inheritance

definitions.text: reach a conclusion after a discussion or deliberation

examples: he resolved never to drink again
The question concerning the meaning of life cannot be answered

definitions.text: cause to go into a solution
examples: The recipe says that we should dissolve a cup of sugar in two cups of water
